Hack Attack, a National Ethical Hacking Conference featuring eminent personalities in this portfolio from all over the globe and zone wise Pre-Tathva Ethical Hacking Workshops throughout South Indian Colleges, the first of its kind intending to provide internships and free learning sessions for all zone-wise winners.

Tathva '11, the annual techno-management fest of NIT Calicut, India is introducing HACKATTACK, a National Ethical hacking Conference with its spotlights on the following:

Ethical Hacking and Information Security Workshops
Panel Discussions
Lectures
Public Awareness
News Letters
Competitions

A journey through tackling the growing number of security threats in Cyber world. A solution to e-mail hacking, SMS and Call Spoofing, Credit Card fraud, Phishing, Remote Key Logging etc. Security tips against malicious threats in social networking sites like Facebook, Orkut etc. Conducted by TechDefence, a rapidly growing security services and investigation consulting organization led by Sunny Vaghela, a pioneer Information Security and Cyber Crime Consultant.

What we provide

1. Live demonstration of different Cyber Attacks, Hands on Practice on Web
2. Application Assessment and Penetration Testing, Cyber Crime Investigations etc.
3. Free - Ethical Hacking and Information Security Software Tool Kit for each student attending the workshop.
4. Authorized Certificates to students after successful completion of the workshop.
5. Free Internship to the topper of each workshop at any of the TechDefence Centre's for an entire TechDefence Certified Cyber Security Expert course of 80 hours worth Rs.15000.
6. Study kits including a (10 DVD set + 2 books) exclusively designed by TechDefence on 'Ethical hacking and Information security' to the topper of each workshop.
7. Online CAPTURE THE FLAG competition after conduction of workshops:
Top 5 scorers will get invitation to the main competition during Tathva '11 @ NIT Calicut offering prizes worth 25K.

Team Profile
1. The workshop will be conducted by TechDefence, a rapidly growing security services and investigation consulting organization led by Sunny Vaghela.
2. TechDefence have rich experience working on cases and training for Crime Branch, Ahmedabad, Rajkot, Surat, Nashik and Hyderabad.
3. Conducted more than 160 workshops and seminars for Students and Professionals across globe.
4. TechDefence helped Top Investigating Agencies to solve Cyber Terrorism Cases like Ahmedabad and Mumbai Blasts Cases.
5. TechDefence do not use third party tools. They have developed our Crypters, Trojans, and Scripts etc.
6. Their Director cum Trainer, Mr. Sunny Vaghela, is supported by Ministry of Home Affairs, Malaysia.

Level 1

Duration: 2 days (8 hours on each day)
Date: Oct 21 and 22, 2011
Organizers: TechDefence
Cost: INR 1200 per person

Level 2

Duration: 1 day (8 hours)
Date: Oct 23, 2011
Organizers: TechDefence
Cost: INR 600 per person

Special discount for participants registering for both Level 1 and Level 2.
